patterns: Changed integrator settings are not reflecting?
responses: Restarting the integrator, any changes made to integrator settings will reflect only after restarting Integrator.

patterns: PDF invoice is showing Blank after attaching DSC?
responses:
step 1:Go to E-invoice tab
 step 2: Digital signature sub tab
 step 3: search for the invoice step 4 :  click on Reset 
 step 5: Sign again

step 1: go to Settings
step 2: Document Types
step 3:Edit the Document Type & check if DSC setting is present . Download screen shot

solution 1: Check if any Opera preview window/Windows are open, if yes, please close the same and ask the user to print the document again for pop up to come
possibility 2: Printer setup might b incorrect, or Printer name might be changed in control panel or the print task in Opera might not be set to Ecobillz Printer due to which prints are going to some other printer.In this case â€“ step 1: Go to Control Panel
step 2 :View Device & Printers
step 3: check the Ecobillz printer name
step 4: go to Opera printer settings and check if the same printer is associated, If not change the printer settings in Opera to Ecobillz Printer and the Pop up will work
possibility 3: If there are multiple Opera preview windows open, close all the open Opera preview windows, Reprint the document again and POP up will come.

patterns: B2B invoices are getting generated as B2C?
responses: Need to check if readers are configured correctly for the mandatory fields like Invoice number, Invoice date & Invoice Total for all PMS invoices If the Property is E-invoice enabled then need to check if the GST number & Tax Summary reading is configured along with the above mentioned 3 fields
See the digitizer flow diagram
